title: and Lukas Haas
description:
Lukas Haas is in Puerto Rico with Randall and Lala filming Rand’s upcoming movie, “Midnight In The Switchgrass,” and talks about the original production shutdown at the start of the pandemic, and what it’s like filming now. He also shares stories about making “The Revenant” with Leonardo DiCaprio, “Witness” with Harrison Ford, and how having cool, artsy, hippy parents allowed him to pursue his acting dream at age 5. Plus, Lala and Rand answer some voicemails, and pay tribute to former Glee start Naya Rivera, and their friend, late actress Kelly Preston.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
